caption.title: Correlation coefficient between body size and year of collection for (a) the four species groups that were compared, and (b) all the species included in the analysis.
caption.p: Aq Birds: aquatic birds, Ter Birds: terrestrial birds, AqMamm: aquatic mammals, Ter Mamm: terrestrial mammals. N = number of species in each group. Bars: 95% confidence intervals. * denotes P < 0.05 and ยง denotes P < 0.1.
